cms.query.QueryText: SELECT AddressID,AddressPersonalName,AddressName,AddressZip,AddressCity,AddressPhone,states.StateDisplayName,country.CountryDisplayName,ShoppingCartID,ShoppingCartDistributorID,ShoppingCartInventoryType FROM COM_Address customer INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCart cart ON customer.AddressID =cart.ShoppingCartDistributorID LEFT JOIN CMS_Country country ON customer.AddressCountryID=country.CountryID LEFT JOIN CMS_State states ON customer.AddressStateID=states.StateID WHERE ##WHERE##
